mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reservation(user_id, res_date, time_no ,rno, class_sub_no, count, status) values(#{user_id}, #{res_date}, #{time_no}, seq_rno.nextval, #{class_sub_no}, #{count}, #{status})
mapper.select: select t.time_no, t.time_start, t.time_end, (p.personnel - s.reserve_count) remain_count from tbl_program_sub s, tbl_class_time t, tbl_program p where s.program_time = t.time_no and p.class_no = s.class_no and s.class_no = #{class_no}
